assessment_item.subject: Mathematics
assessment_item.title: Test 2 If \\hat{i} , \\hat{j} , \\hat{k} are unit vectors along the positive direction of x,  y, and  z axes, then which one of the following is a false statement.
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

If \\hat{i} , \\hat{j} , \\hat{k} are unit vectors along the positive direction of x,  y, and  z axes, then which one of the following is a false statement.

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

\\Sigma\\hat{i}\\times\\left(\\hat{j}\\times\\hat{k}\\right)=\\vec{0}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1222"},{"text":"

\\Sigma\\hat{i}\\times\\left(\\hat{j}+\\hat{k}\\right)=\\overline{0}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1223"},{"text":"

\\Sigma\\hat{i.}\\left(\\hat{j}+\\hat{k}\\right)=\\vec{0}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:3789"},{"text":"

\\Sigma\\hat{i}.\\left(\\hat{j}\\times\\hat{k}\\right)=\\vec{0}

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:4078"}],"questionCount":0,"media":[]},"config":{"metadata":{"max_score":1,"isShuffleOption":false,"isPartialScore":true,"templateType":"Horizontal","name":"Test 2 If \\hat{i} , \\hat{j} , \\hat{k} are unit vectors along the positive direction of x,  y, and  z axes, then which one of the following is a false statement.","title":"Test 2 If \\hat{i} , \\hat{j} , \\hat{k} are unit vectors along the positive direction of x,  y, and  z axes, then which one of the following is a false statement.","description":"testing symbols","board":"State (Tamil Nadu)","medium":"English","subject":"Mathematics","gradeLevel":["Class 6"],"qlevel":"EASY","category":"MCQ"},"max_time":0,"max_score":1,"partial_scoring":true,"layout":"Horizontal","isShuffleOption":false,"questionCount":1},"media":[]}}
